Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury Prop. #1 -- 5.05 Mills renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Library Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 5.05 mills property tax continuation for the administration, improvement, operation, maintenance and support of the Sabine Parish Library and its branches, including the costs of any capital improvements thereto.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Sabine, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of five and five hundredths (5.05) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $522,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of the administration, improvement, operation, maintenance and support of the Sabine Parish Library and its branches, including the costs of any capital improvements thereto, said millage to represent a two hundredths of a mill (.02) increase over the 5.03 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on January 20, 2001?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury Prop. #2 -- 1.00 Mill renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Health Unit Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 1.00 mill property tax renewal for operation, administration, support and maintenance for the Sabine Parish Health Unit, including the costs of any capital improvements thereto.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Sabine, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $103,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of operation, administration, support and maintenance for the Sabine Parish Health Unit, including the costs of any capital improvements thereto?
